title: 54 Best Memorial Day Sales We’re Shopping Now
description: Get up to 70 percent off some of our favorite brands.
excerpt: Including up to 70 percent off top brands.
text: Stock up on sunscreen and set your out-of-office notice: Memorial Day is just around the corner on May 26. And whether your summer plans involve lounging seaside, following Beyoncé on tour, or attending yet another wedding, the best Memorial Day weekend sales are a great opportunity to stock up on essentials at a fraction of the price. Better yet, many have already started—we’re seeing up to 70 percent off beloved brands like Aligne, Tory Burch, Apple, and Dyson. There’s a lot of ground to cover, so we’ve broken up the top Memorial Day sales into categories to make it a little easier on you. Read on to shop the 54 best discounts across fashion, beauty, home, and tech. Happy shopping. The Best Memorial Day Fashion DealsIf you, too, are in the process of rotating in your warm-weather wardrobe, you might find you’re missing a few staples. In the realm of officewear, structured pieces in airy fabrics like linen and poplin from Everlane and Rag & Bone make great go-tos; but if you're already planning your seaside vacations, focus on beachy items from Hunza G, A. Emery, and Faithfull the Brand. Our sale selects already go up to 70 percent off. html:
Stock up on sunscreen and set your out-of-office notice: Memorial Day is just around the corner on May 26. And whether your summer plans involve lounging seaside, following Beyoncé on tour, or attending yet another wedding, the best Memorial Day weekend sales are a great opportunity to stock up on essentials at a fraction of the price. Better yet, many have already started—we’re seeing up to 70 percent off beloved brands like Aligne, Tory Burch, Apple, and Dyson.

There’s a lot of ground to cover, so we’ve broken up the top Memorial Day sales into categories to make it a little easier on you. Read on to shop the 54 best discounts across fashion, beauty, home, and tech. Happy shopping.

The Best Memorial Day Fashion Deals

If you, too, are in the process of rotating in your warm-weather wardrobe, you might find you’re missing a few staples. In the realm of officewear, structured pieces in airy fabrics like linen and poplin from Everlane and Rag & Bone make great go-tos; but if you're already planning your seaside vacations, focus on beachy items from Hunza G, A. Emery, and Faithfull the Brand. Our sale selects already go up to 70 percent off.

The Best Memorial Day Beauty Deals

Ahead of the holiday weekend, enjoy up to 40 percent off editor- and celebrity-loved brands like Saie, Medicube, and Dyson. The Cosrx Snail Mucin serum ELLE staffers rave about is marked down over 30 percent when you buy it in a gift set; meanwhile, Kendall Jenner’s Met Gala L’Oréal lipstick is still going for just $6.

The Best Memorial Day Home Deals

From plush sofas to colorful décor, you can save big on all kinds of home purchases right now. Everything you need for a seasonal refresh is here, from a bestselling Dyson vacuum to finally kickstart your spring cleaning to a lightweight Parachute quilt for transitioning your bedding for warmer nights and a set of rattan-wrapped tumblers from Lulu & Georgia that are perfect for entertaining alfresco. Our favorite finds start at just $28.
